homepage.main-title: Swap your favorite CRYPTO without KYC
homepage.choose-currency-description: Pick one of 50 000+ supported currency pairs from the list
homepage.make-deposit-description: Confirm details and send your assets to the generated address
homepage.get-your-coins-description: Receive exchanged crypto with the best possible rate
homepage.fast-crypto-exchange-description: The average time for exchange is about 5 minutes. You can track the progress on the exchange page.
homepage.limitless-exchange-description: You can start from less than $2 and swap as much crypto as you want – there is no upper limit.
homepage.save-money-description: Best exchange rates and minimum commissions.
